front.title: A YANG Data Model for WDM management in Front-Haul NBI

abstract.t: This document introduces an architecture of semi-active fronthaul WDM system and explains how the semi-active devices can be managed by a transmission controller. This document also specifies a YANG data model for the WDM devices in front-haul scenario, which is defined in G.owdm. The model is expected to be used in the Northbound of controller.
